import React, {useState} from 'react'; export const Form = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name : "", email : "", message : "" }) const changeHandler = e => { setForm({...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const submitHandler = (e) => { console.log(form) } return (

Add employeer

With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content.

We'll never share your data with anyone else.
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
) }
